Knowledge Brief: Arbor Networks Recognized

Did you know that NETSCOUT Arbor has been recognized by Quandrant as the 2017 market and technology leader in the global DDoS mitigation market?

Five Questions to Ask When Considering a DDoS Managed Service

As IT organizations are forced to do more with less, many are outsourcing security components such as DDoS protection to managed service providers. So what do you need to consider before trusting a vendor with your network?

The Growing Risk of DDoS Attacks

As DDoS attacks increase in size, frequency and complexity, enterprises must reassess their vulnerability to severe network outages.

How to Analyze and Reduce the Risk of DDoS Attacks

When was the last time you assessed your infrastructure’s vulnerability to DDoS attacks?

IoT DDoS Attacks Show the Stakes Have Changed

Powered by a complex network of connected devices, IoT botnets are nothing new. The same goes for IoT DDoS attacks, but they can teach us something new about preventing failure.

Taking the Case for Advanced DDoS Protection Upstairs

As the guardian of your network, you understand the threat a DDoS attack poses to your system’s integrity – but for your senior executives, it’s all about the financial impact.

Arbor Managed DDoS Protection Services for Enterprises

With the frequency and complexity of DDoS attacks on the rise, enterprises must be prepared for the worst-case scenario. But as many businesses have discovered, mitigating the threats with in-house resources is tough.

Most companies have begun migrating workloads to the cloud. But did you know that speeding up operations, optimizing costs, and improving performance and service delivery are the top goals of IT professionals?

Ensuring Secure and Successful Deployments of Nsx by Extending Your Visiblity with NETSCOUT

Making the decision to evolve to the agile NSX SDDC environment as part of your Digital Transformation initiative brings its own challenges of security design and application deployment; and is not without risk. This means that maintaining visibility to assure your business service into this new virtual, secure world is critical to migration success.

Entering the Terabit Era: Get Ready For Bigger DDoS Attacks

According to NETSCOUT’s ATLAS Security Engineering and Response Team (ASERT), the maximum size of DDoS attacks increased 174% in the first half of 2018 over the same period in 2017.

Future Smarter with NETSCOUT – Migrate to the Hybrid Cloud with Confidence

Optimize the delivery of applications and services to your entire organization. Extend your NETSCOUT visibility by using smart data to empower your migration to the Cloud. Learn more about how nGenius enables your implementation by giving you a single, pervasive view bridging the gap between public, private and hybrid-Cloud environments.

Remote Sites Monitoring

Monitor from where? Watch this 45 second video clip to get an idea of the kinds of places you can use NETSCOUT nGeniusPULSE to monitor the availability and performance of your network and applications.

Where Are The Remote Sites You Want To Monitor From?

Watch this short, 45 second, video clip showing just some of the possibilities of remote sites to monitor using NETSCOUT nGeniusPULSE
Tigerlogic Solutions Limited

Why CDNs Don’t Solve Your DDoS Problem

A false sense of security is the worst thing that can happen to your business. Large Content Delivery Networks have reached truly global size, the underlying technologies have made it possible to implement “clouds” of services, and the “cloud” now is becoming synonymous with the internet itself.
EPE Retelem SPA

Informed transformation enables continuity

With NETSCOUT’s Smart Data-driven approach, used across your digital landscape encompassing hybrid-Cloud, virtual network and DevOps environments, you’ll be able to get the visibility and right data, fast, to the people and the systems that need it.

Cloud Smart with NETSCOUT

NETSCOUT empowers government IT teams to defend against cyber-attacks, embrace and deploy Cloud Smart technology, and modernize their infrastructure to achieve their missions and objectives.

Cyber Threat

Protecting information and people from a rapidly emerging cyber threat landscape is often the top priority for many government agencies and often is the most elusive to achieve. Identifying internal threats leveraging existing technologies and having the security analytics and investigative powers to drill down into the suspicious activity is essential. Likewise, identifying external threats and mitigating the impact to a system with blocking, providing contextual threat intelligence, and thwarting advanced volumetric, application layer, state exhaustion, and targeted malware attacks is no longer a luxury – it is essential.

Realizing the Full Value of DevOps

The ultimate business promise of agile development and continuous deployment is applications that deliver stronger customer engagement and increased productivity from better enterprise services.

Cloud Migration Strategies

IEEE conducted a survey to explore the challenges, strategies, and awareness of Cloud professionals when it comes to Cloud migration and monitoring; and to surface top priorities for effective Cloud migration strategies and solutions.

Is Your Information Close Enough to the Edge?

Moving cloud, compute and processing power to the edge of the network will support the ultra-low latency requirements of 5G applications, such as connected cars, which run at the network edge.
